description.value: These manacles are nearly indistinguishable from real manacles upon inspection, but contain a hidden release that enables a wearer who knows the location of the release to free themselves with a single Interact action. An observer who examines the manacles and succeeds at a @Check[type:perception|dc:20|traits:action:seek] check notices their false nature. On a critical success, the observer finds the location of the hidden catch as well.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
